'''13w18b''' is the fifth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]], released on May 2, 2013<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/05/minecraft-snapshot-13w18a/</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w18a]] snapshot.

== Fixes ==
'''[https://bugs.mojang.com/issues/?jql=project%20%3D%20MC%20AND%20issuetype%20%3D%20Bug%20AND%20fixVersion%20%3D%20%22Snapshot%2013w18b%22 5 bugs fixed]'''
* {{bug|MC-15020}} – Animations are not working.
* {{bug|MC-15022}} – FPS drop due to new texture system while looking at horses.
* {{bug|MC-15027}} – Crash on world load.
* {{bug|MC-15034}} – Texture pack descriptions do not load.
* {{bug|MC-15036}} – Riding horses into obstacles crashes the game.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* As with [[13w18a]] and [[13w18c]], this snapshot was released on the same day as [[Java Edition 1.5.2|1.5.2]].
